response.overview: "This is the half hour film I made about my neighbor, Mister Butch, the exiled king of Kenmore Square, who lived in Allston MA USA at the same time I did, except that I had a roof over my head and he didn't. True to his word, Mister Butch died in the street in 2007. He was missed by many. I flew back to Boston for his memorial parade, I think there were like 1000 people in the street. To make this little no budget movie I had help from Amy Whitten, Jenny Tse, Jennet Cook, Star Nigro, James Ryan, and Nathan Lewis Hughes, among others."
response.title: Searching for Mr. Butch
